content:
Would it be possible to warn the user when attempting to configure multiple exclusive rustflags sources? Or are there too many valid use cases doing that on purpose? https://doc.rust-lang.org/cargo/reference/config.html#buildrustflags

I just wasted a bit of time figuring out why my local cargo config with some rustflags in [build] wasn't getting applied, and it turns out it was because I had target.<triple>.rustflags configured on a higher level.
